recipesJson.name: Cherry Limeade (POD)
recipesJson.author: cexshun
recipesJson.description: Sweet and slightly tart cherry limeade similar to Sonic's beverage.

reviews.text: Going to let this steep a bit longer.  On the S and V I get the cherry and lime essence, but no ice or sweetener.  Maybe the steep will help bring those out.  I do like this though, just a bit mild.
